question: The great philosopher and dialectician Santarakshita lived and worked during the reign of which of the following kings?
explanation: King Gopala who ruled from 750 A.D. to 770A.D. was the founder of the Pala Dynasty of the Bengal region of the Indian Subcontinent. He was a great patron of Buddhism. The great philosopher and dialectician Santarakshita lived and worked during his reign.
